scripts.build-dev:ncpi-catalog: scripts/common-build.sh ncpi-catalog dev && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-prod:ncpi-catalog: ./scripts/common-build.sh ncpi-catalog prod && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-dev:anvil-catalog: scripts/common-build.sh anvil-catalog dev && next build && next export -o out/data && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-prod:anvil-catalog: ./scripts/common-build.sh anvil-catalog prod && next build && next export -o out/data && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:lungmap: ./scripts/build.sh lungmap && next build && next export -o out/explore && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:anvil: ./scripts/build.sh anvil && next build && next export -o out/explore && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:anvil-cmg: ./scripts/build.sh anvil-cmg && next build && next export -o out/explore && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-cc-dev:anvil-cmg: ./scripts/common-build.sh anvil-cmg cc-dev && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-dev:hca-dcp: ./scripts/common-build.sh  hca-dcp dev && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-cc-ma-dev:hca-dcp: ./scripts/common-build.sh  hca-dcp cc-ma-dev && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-ma-dev:hca-dcp: ./scripts/common-build.sh  hca-dcp ma-dev && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-ma-prod:hca-dcp: ./scripts/common-build.sh  hca-dcp ma-prod && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-prod:hca-dcp: ./scripts/build.sh hca-dcp prod && next build && next export -o out && npm run postbuild
